verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abihu, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w each|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w censer|strong="H4289"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* fire \w therein|strong="H2004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w thereon|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* fire \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Elzaphan, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w Draw|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* brethren \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* Ithamar, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hair|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w loose|strong="H5921"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w rend|strong="H6533"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* clothes; \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* brethren, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w bewail|strong="H1058"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w burning|strong="H8316"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindled|strong="H8313"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w Drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, thou, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H8354"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H4191"\w* thee, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w ye|strong="H8354"\w* go into \w the|strong="H4191"\w* tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w meeting|strong="H4150"\w*, \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w ye|strong="H8354"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w for|strong="H2708"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w throughout|strong="H1755"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*:

\w and|strong="H6944"\w* \w that|strong="H6944"\w* ye \w may|strong="H2889"\w* make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* distinction between \w the|strong="H2455"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w and|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H2455"\w* \w common|strong="H2455"\w*, \w and|strong="H6944"\w* between \w the|strong="H2455"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w and|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H2455"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w*;

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w ye|strong="H1696"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* Ithamar, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* meal-offering \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w remaineth|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* eat \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w without|strong="H3588"\w* \w leaven|strong="H4682"\w* beside \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*;

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* ye \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* eat \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w portion|strong="H2706"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*’ \w portion|strong="H2706"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wave-breast \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* heave-thigh \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w ye|strong="H5414"\w* eat \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w thou|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w portion|strong="H2706"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*’ \w portion|strong="H2706"\w*, \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* peace-offerings \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* heave-thigh \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wave-breast \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w bring|strong="H2706"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* fire \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wave-offering \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w thine|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*’ \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w portion|strong="H2706"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w diligently|strong="H1875"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w goat|strong="H8163"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sin-offering, \w and|strong="H1121"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* Ithamar, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, saying,

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* brought into \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* \w within|strong="H6441"\w*: \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* should \w certainly|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* eaten \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, \w as|strong="H6680"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.
